title: Kay Spiritual Life Center
cleaned_text: Our Methodist Values How does AU today reflect the Methodist values with which we were founded? Office Hours: During the school year: Monday-Friday 9 AM to 9 PM Summer: Monday-Friday 9 AM to 5 PM Subscribe to the [Communi-Kay](http://eepurl.com/ccvDcv)—an email newsletter of programs and events of the Kay communities. Our community partners, student groups, and University Chaplain are ready to help you reflect, find comfort, learn, and grow. Learn about the rich diversity of beliefs you can find at the Kay Spiritual Life Center. On occasion, religious observance necessitates an accommodation for students pertaining to academic, housing, dining, or health related purposes. If you have a need for such a religious accommodation, submit a request.
